message.content: Write a short story about streaming data (3 sentences)

content.text: Data flowed like a digital river through the fiber optic cables, each packet a droplet racing toward its destination. Sarah watched the real-time dashboard pulse with activity as millions of events cascaded through the pipeline, transforming raw chaos into structured insights. In that moment, she realized she wasn't just processing informationâ€”she was conducting a symphony of bits and bytes that never stopped playing.
